movies.title: Zenda
movies.plot: The movie is based on the actual life of party workers who have aligned their loyalty towards a particular political party, and also loosely based on the most reputed and powerful political family of Balasaheb Thackeray. It highlights the glorious past of party and strong organisation fighting for Marathi community in Maharashtra, India. The storyline depicts the plight of party workers who have aligned their loyalty towards a particular political party based on its apex leader. When the leadership baton is passed on to the next generation, one of the new leaders breaks away from the core. What follows is the rift between friends who were once bonded together by the cause led by the party and now finding themselves opposing each other. The movie also touches on the part where Political images have been built completely based on Media and PR exercises. Under pressure from the media campaign managers and in an attempt to please the monitory vote banks, the ideologies behind the parties ...
movies.simplePlot: Two young politicians cannot see eye to eye, resulting in the split of a political party into two factions.

biography.bio: Siddharth Chandekar is an actor, known for Agnihotra (2009), Lagna Pahave Karun (2013) and Sound of Heaven: The Story of Balgandharva (2011).
biography.name: Siddharth Chandekar

biography.bio: Neha Joshi is an actress and producer, known for Hawaa Hawaai (2014), Saturday Sunday (2014) and Baghtos Kay Mujra Kar (2017).
biography.name: Neha Joshi

biography.bio: Santosh Juvekar is an actor, known for Mumbai Meri Jaan (2008), Shala (2011) and Gadbad Gondhal (2017).
biography.name: Santosh Juvekar

biography.bio: Chinmay Mandlekar is an actor and writer, known for Tere Bin Laden (2010), Duniyadari (2013) and Hou De Jarasa Ushir (2012).
biography.name: Chinmay Mandlekar

biography.bio: Sachit Patil is an actor and director, known for Kshanbhar Vishranti (2010), Saade Maade Teen (2007) and Zenda (2009).
biography.name: Sachit Patil

biography.bio: Tejashree Pradhan is an actress, known for Ti Saddhya Kay Karte (2017), Uday (2012) and Lagna Pahave Karun (2013).
biography.name: Tejashree Pradhan
